annotations.description: We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. Neither of the teams had any obvious superiority in this game. The home side was creating their opportunities using lightning-fast counter-attacks. The tactic of the away side was slow build-up play.
